Bescher SGC 40: SOLD
Bradley SGC 40: SOLD
Byrne SGC A (Lionel Carter) SOLD

Gowdy SGC A (originally a PSA 2): SOLD
Phelan SGC 10 (ANON - a beater but still tough): SOLD
Reulbach SGC 40 (originally a PSA 4): SOLD
Schaefer SGC 40: SOLD

Please email me at ronald.lambert9@verizon.net if interested.

Thanks

Ron
